name: Balaam
description: Prophet for hire who was paid to curse Israel but couldn't do it. His curses kept coming out as blessings. Famously rebuked by his talking donkey. A mercenary whose greatest failure became Israel's blessing.

failed-curse.name: The Failed Curse
failed-curse.description: Arms raised to curse but words won't come - or come out as blessing
failed-curse.prompt: arms raised in attempt to curse - face showing strain and frustration, mouth open but wrong words emerging, the moment of failure when curse becomes blessing, visibly struggling against divine will

donkey-confrontation.name: Rebuked by Donkey
donkey-confrontation.description: The humiliating moment when his donkey speaks truth
donkey-confrontation.prompt: confronted by speaking donkey - face showing shock and embarrassment, the great prophet humiliated by his own beast, staff in hand but powerless, the comedic low point

overlooking-israel.name: Overlooking the Camp
overlooking-israel.description: Standing on mountain looking down at Israel's tents
overlooking-israel.prompt: standing on mountaintop overlooking vast camp below - staff in hand, eyes calculating, the mercenary prophet surveying his target, preparing to curse but destined to bless

receiving-payment.name: Prophet for Hire
receiving-payment.description: Taking payment from Balak to curse Israel
receiving-payment.prompt: receiving bags of silver or gold - hands reaching for payment, the prophet who sells his gift, greedy gleam in eye, about to take on a job he cannot complete

forced-blessing.name: Involuntary Blessing
forced-blessing.description: Hands raised but blessing instead of cursing
forced-blessing.prompt: hands raised with blessing emerging instead of curse - face showing confusion as beautiful words pour out against his will, the prophet whose mouth betrays his intentions

seeing-angel.name: Eyes Finally Opened
seeing-angel.description: The moment Balaam sees the angel his donkey saw
seeing-angel.prompt: falling back in terror as eyes are opened to see angel - the prophet who couldn't see what his donkey saw, finally confronted with divine reality, sword-bearing angel before him
